description: Minimal metadata for mass spectrometry as developed in the METASPACE project
title: Metadata Submission

_88person.description: Name and contact email for a human

___Sample_Preparation.description: Information about how the sample was prepared for the experiment

___Sample_Preparation_Freetext.description: Additional sample preparation information  (e.g. relevant methods section from a publication)

___Expected_Molecules_Freetext.description: A "|" separated list of molecules or database ids that are known a priori to be present in the sample

___Additional_Information_Freetext.description: Additional experimental information (e.g the methods section from a publication)

___Sample_Description_Freetext.description: Additional sample information (e.g. relevant methods section from a publication)

___Detector_Resolving_Power.description: Estimate of the resolving power within the dataset, and the m/z at which it was estimated
___Detector_Resolving_Power.title: Detector Resolving Power

___mz.description: m/z at which the resolving power was calculated (Orbitrap resolution is quoted at m/z=200)

___Sample_Information.description: Information about the sample that was imaged.

___Sample_Growth_Conditions.description: intervention, treatment group or growth conditions
